com.inherentgames

Class BBRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threed.jpct.World
      • com.inherentgames.BBRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BBRoom
extends com.threed.jpct.World
    Author:
    Tyler An extension of the JPCT-AE class 'World', BBRoom handles loading objects and placing the room. It also creates 4 walls and a floor and ceiling using the parameters stored per room. Since it is the room that everything is contained in, it keeps track of bubbles, wordObjects, and their RigidBodies
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
